buildFromMessageSources

static java.util.Map buildFromMessageSources(java.util.Map messageSources, boolean searchOnlyInBaseApp)
Builds a map of countries with their names, alternatives and relevancy
Parameters:
messageSources - Map of message sources starting with 'org.grails.plugin.countrySelector.'. For each country a code, code.alternatives, code.relevancy is expected. Example of one country message source: org.grails.plugin.countrySelector.DEU=Germany // country code is DEU and the name is Germany org.grails.plugin.countrySelector.DEU.alternatives=Bundes Republik Deutchland // comma separated alternatives org.grails.plugin.countrySelector.DEU.relevancy=1 // number relevancy
searchOnlyInBaseApp - if true searches just in the base application if false search also in country selector plugin and merge it with application specified (application specified has more relevancy)
Returns:
Structured map of all countries recognized in following format: [countries: [ AUT: [ label: "Austria", alternatives: ["AUT", "AT", "Österreich", "Osterreich", "Oesterreich"], relevancy: 1 ] ] ]

listCountryCodes

static java.util.List listCountryCodes(java.util.Map messageSources, boolean searchOnlyInBaseApp)
List all countries codes
Parameters:
messageSources - Map of message sources starting with 'org.grails.plugin.countrySelector.'. For each country a code, code.alternatives, code.relevancy is expected. Example of one country message source: org.grails.plugin.countrySelector.DEU=Germany // country code is DEU and the name is Germany org.grails.plugin.countrySelector.DEU.alternatives=Bundes Republik Deutchland // comma separated alternatives org.grails.plugin.countrySelector.DEU.relevancy=1 // number relevancy
searchOnlyInBaseApp - if true searches just in the base application if false search also in country selector plugin and merge it with application specified (application specified has more relevancy)
Returns:
List of relevant country codes
